title: Redneck Rampage Family Reunion (Interplay Productions) [ENG]
description:
Information :
Year : 1997-1999
Genre : FPS
Developer : Xatrix Entertainment
Publisher : Interplay Entertainment Corp.
Publication Type: Assembly
Language : English

System Requirements :
Operating System: MS-DOS / XP / Vista / 7
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E7400 (or similar) ( for DosBox need a powerful processor )
Memory: 512 MB Ã¢â‚¬â€¹
Video Card: 3D-graphics card compatible with DirectX 9.0c

Description :
Redneck Rampage - Computer game in the genre of first-person shooter released in 1997 year by Interplay. The main character is a villager - Leonard, who saves the planet and her brother Bubba from aliens. From similar games of its era Redneck Rampage different incomparable sense of humor. For example, as a weapon in the game and used a claw hammer, and a crossbow, which is bolted to the boom sticks of dynamite, and some alien weapon in appearance resembling a bra, and in fact - the machine gun. Redneck Rampage Family Reunion - a collection comprising Cuss Pack add-on (adds strong language and linguistic turns redneck voice acting in games), Redneck Rampage: Suckin Grits on Route 66, Redneck Rampage Rides Again and Redneck Deer Huntin '(something type of hunting simulator game engine)

Installation :
- Run "Redneck Rampage Family Reunion.exe".
- Install.
- Run the game in compability mode & as admin.
